article_title: Ted Cruz tells Johnson County he’s the conservative alternative to Donald Trump
article_text:
Senator from Texas tells local crowd that his campaign can still take the Republican presidential nomination

Cruz won three states in Super Tuesday voting, while Donald Trump took home seven wins

He blasts Trump as a candidate lacking conservative bona fides

article_metadata.news-keywords: Ted Cruz, Jeff Roe, Johnson County Community College, JCCC, Kansas, caucus, presidential, politics, Super Tuesday, overland park, trump, rubio
article_metadata.description: Sen. Ted Cruz spoke to perhaps 2,000 at Johnson County Community College on Wednesday, saying only he could beat Donald Trump in the primaries and deliver a truly conservative agenda.
article_metadata.title: Ted Cruz tells Johnson County he’s the conservative alternative to Donald Trump | The Kansas City Star
